definition: to beat/to flog/to examine under torture

sentences.english: High-level security policies are documents in manual or digital format.
sentences.chinese: 高級安全策略是硬拷貝或數字格式的文檔。

sentences.english: These printouts are sometimes referred to as hard copy.
sentences.chinese: 這種打印輸出有時也被稱爲硬拷貝。

sentences.english: That allowed us to stock many more copies of hot titles and to advertise their availability.
sentences.chinese: 這使得我們能夠擁有更多的熱門拷貝，並且廣而告之。

sentences.english: All three are stop-the-world copying collectors.
sentences.chinese: 所有這三種都是拷貝收集器。

sentences.english: The C++ standard allows for the copy constructor to be elided in certain situations.
sentences.chinese: 標準的允許拷貝構造函數要省略在某些情況下。

sentences.english: Because,unlike software,which can be literally copied, as many as you want identical,the body can't split.
sentences.chinese: 因爲不同於可被不斷拷貝的軟件，肉體是不能分裂的。

sentences.english: We will copy these files into our project later.
sentences.chinese: 我們將拷貝這些文件到我們的項目。

sentences.english: But this does not yet get us to our goal of zero copy.
sentences.chinese: 但是這個代碼尚未達到我們的零拷貝要求。

sentences.english: Consider an elementary implementation of memory copy.
sentences.chinese: 請考慮內存拷貝的基本實現。

sentences.english: Save all consol parameters on hard copy or to the floppy disk.
sentences.chinese: 將所有控制檯參數進行硬拷貝或保存在磁盤上。
訂購硬拷貝手冊的鏈接。

sentences.english: Copy the values to the formal parameters passed to this function.
sentences.chinese: 將這些值拷貝到傳遞給這個函數的行參數中。

sentences.english: In the first step, create a copy of your main schema for every developer.
sentences.chinese: 在第一步中，爲每一個開發人員創建主要方案的拷貝。

sentences.english: The same color timing for making the answer print is used here.
sentences.chinese: 在這個環節裏使用同樣的配光方式製作校正拷貝。

sentences.english: Seller sends hard copy of BG/SBLC via bank-bonded courier.
sentences.chinese: 賣方通過銀行專遞發送硬拷貝。

sentences.english: Use se other flashcard's save files directly.
sentences.chinese: 可以直接拷貝使用其他燒錄卡的存檔。

definition: to file/to save a file (computer)/saved data (for a video game etc)
to duplicate/to make a copy of/to copy/to reproduce/to clone
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
